lines: Petyo, Petyo, ne mwoyo venyu, Ndiswendedze imwi munokosha
Petyo, Petyo, handina chiro chemupiro kuna Jesu mambo;
Chete mwoyo unechitema, Ndicheneseyi ne ropa renyu;
Petyo, Petyo, zve kuva wenyu, Ndino siya zvese zvechitema
Petyo, Petyo, ndichikupona, Dakara ndiswike mâ€™mbiri
Petyo Muponesi, petyo nemwi,Petyo Muponesi, petyo nemwi
